price: Tí ẹ (bá fẹ́) gbẹ̀san (ìyà), ẹ gbẹ̀san irú ìyà tí wọ́n fi jẹ yín. Dájúdájú tí ẹ bá sì ṣe sùúrù, òhun ló mà lóore jùlọ fún àwọn onísùúrù.
arabic: وَإِنۡ عَاقَبۡتُمۡ فَعَاقِبُواْ بِمِثۡلِ مَا عُوقِبۡتُم بِهِۦۖ وَلَئِن صَبَرۡتُمۡ لَهُوَ خَيۡرٞ لِّلصَّٰبِرِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-in ʿāqabtum faʿāqibū bimith'li mā ʿūqib'tum bihi wala-in ṣabartum lahuwa khayrun lilṣṣābirīna
